comment._content: Opera singer; in fall 1915 she was coming to the US, a 21-year-old from Trieste: "Toscanini Wavers Over His Return," New York Times (25 September 1915): 11.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for identifying opera singer Ida Cajetti. We will add more details about her when we update.

comment.author: 25767425@N02
comment._content: I know it was acceptable fashion back then, but still, it's just plain weird-looking.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Isn't it?  I can't wrap my mind around these either. I guess I can understand how someone might find the texture of fur luxurious, on a purely sensory level; but this whole-carcass thing... no.
